name: Subtitles
body:
# Subtitles
Yet another srt subtitle editor.

The main goal of this editor was to to have a broad constraint system for subtitles that would allow an easy and fast workflow. A great set of shortcuts also helps you get done earlier.
Since this project mainly focuses on these constraints it is otherwise very minimalistic.

You can download the App on www.eniestudio.de
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
